I really love professor attitude and energy. But I really disappointed that the content all of the course not the same with course syllabus. I think that I don't get any new knowledge.
ppt的內容很完善，不過授課時都照著念，有點無趣。老師很認真，不過如果可以多加些實際案例或用活一點的方式可以更好。
Too many students in the class. Be stricter with the time limit of presentations, give more feedback on how to improve.
Because this is social media marketing, give class more practice to apply media social in daily life for marketing strategy, not just theory. Because that's a bit boring for some students.
無
因為修課人數眾多，為了每組都要上台報告導致報告時間太久，實際上課時數並沒有太多，上課時的內容也多侷限於課本內容，希望能增加更多實務上應用的解說；考試的時候也希望能避免考太制式化的東西或是減少分數配比（例如期中考最後一大題）
教授第一次開課就是外語教學，辛苦了
Too many students in the class. Be stricter with the time limit of presentations, give more feedback on how to improve.
